#labels Listener,Graph,Deprecated
= Total Transactions Per Second <sup><font color=gray size="1">since 0.3.0</font></sup> / <sup><font color=red size="1">deprecated since 0.4.0</font></sup>=

This graph shows the total number of successful and failed transactions per second.
It counts for each seconds the number of finished transactions.
